about_the_game:
So Many Zombies! More zombies than you can shake a stick at... or a shotgun or a rocket or a laser....

In this top down, dual-stick horde bullet hell with endless zombies, survive as long as you can against a perpetually overwhelming zombie horde. Luckily, you can find an arsenal of high powered weaponry to help you.

Level up your weapons and power over time, and punish those zombies.

content_descriptors.notes: In this zombie horde video game, players will encounter mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences. This includes intense and graphic violence, as players must fend off hordes of cartoon zombies using various weapons and tactics. The game features stylized depictions of blood, gore, and dismemberment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1909 or higher)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core) / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (3.5 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1909 or higher)
